name: BiffCo Tower & Casino
description: Great Scott! You're standing before the BiffCo Tower & Casino, a gaudy, neon-drenched monument to bad taste that scrapes the smog-filled sky. It's the kind of place that makes you feel like you've taken a wrong turn somewhere in time. Owned by none other than Hill Valley's number one bully, Biff Tannen, this place is the rotten core of his empire. The hum of electricity and the distant sound of slot machines create a constant, unsettling buzz. This has to be it... Biff's headquarters. But getting in? That's a whole other problem.
